welcome_message_body: Welcome to St. Petersburg, where charm meets history and culture. Explore our beautiful city, known for its stunning waterfront and vibrant arts scene, and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Linking Heights
restaurants.description: Linking Heights is a pizzeria located in Saint Petersburg.

restaurants.name: Ichiban Japanese Restaurant
restaurants.description: Ichiban Japanese Restaurant is a sushi restaurant located in Saint Petersburg.

restaurants.name: Trip's Diner
restaurants.description: Trip's Diner is a diner located in Saint Petersburg.

restaurants.description: Kissin' Cuzzins is a breakfast spot located in Saint Petersburg.

restaurants.name: Siam Garden
restaurants.description: Siam Garden is a thai restaurant located in Saint Petersburg.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is a smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'PIE Free WiFi' from the available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers a luxurious and comfortable experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tampa International Airport serves as the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside A
terminals.description: Airside A at Tampa International Airport handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Airside C
terminals.description: Airside C at Tampa International Airport serves as the hub for Southwest Airlines and handles domestic flights.

terminals.name: Airside E
terminals.description: Airside E at Tampa International Airport handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No login or password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mac Dill AFB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Mac Dill AFB Airport is used exclusively for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sarasota/Bradenton International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Sarasota/Bradenton International Airport is primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
